member.name: T:LateStartManager
member.summary: Calls LateStart on all objects that implement INeedsLateStart.
member.remarks: Needs to be the last script to execute on the script execution order.

member.name: T:INeedsLateStart
member.summary: Implementation of the LateStart method. If an object implements this LateStart will be called when the game starts.

member.name: T:Utility
member.summary: This class contains miscellaneous helper functions (Unity "tricks"/"hacks", math, etc)

member.name: M:Utility.ContainsLayers(UnityEngine.LayerMask,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Checks if a LayerMask contains one or more layers.

member.name: M:Utility.SetLayers(UnityEngine.LayerMask,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Adds one or more layers to a LayerMask

member.name: M:Utility.ResetLayers(UnityEngine.LayerMask,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Removes one or more layers from a LayerMask

member.name: M:Utility.ScaleRange(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Scales x from inA-inB to outA-outB
